description: A request to the openstack api that contains invalid values for the query params 'limit' or 'offset' returns a response as if limit or offset were not provided. For example: GET /servers?limit=foo. The api should return a 400 response. This happens on the trunk currently at rev. 760.
title: http query params limit and offset are ignored when they are malformed
